General.Name: Jinhui Mining Co Ltd
General.Description: Jinhui Mining Incorporation Limited engages in the exploration, mining, processing, and sale of lead, zinc, silver, and other mineral resources in China. It owns mining rights comprising the Guojiagou mining right, Guojiagou South mining right, and Xiejiagou mining right; and exploration rights that consists of Jiangkou prospecting right, Guojiagou prospecting right, and Huomaidi prospecting right, as well as the Lijiagou Concentrator. The company's mining area is located at the eastern end of the southern ore belt of the Xicheng ore field. In addition, it engages in the purchase and sale of mineral products; mine engineering; and trading business, as well as hotel management operations. Jinhui Mining Incorporation Limited was incorporated in 2011 and is based in Longnan, China. Jinhui Mining Incorporation Limited operates as a subsidiary of Gansu Yate Investment Group Co., Ltd.
